attributes.action: Manufacture PPE  in the United Kingdom to ensure quality and security of supply.
attributes.additional_details: Covid 19 has highlighted the total dependency on China to supply the world with PPE, we can never allow this to happen again.
attributes.background: We are quite capable as a country of manufacturing all Personal Protection Equipment required to meet the demand of any future pandemic. I would like the government to encourage business and insist on made in UK products to protect our NHS and all other areas of use.
